name: Bushido (Fhy)
description:
Show your back to your enemy is the biggest shame for Bushi.

Outplay your enemy.

How to play:

ActionPlayer 1Player 2MoveA / DLeft / RightStrikeJ1StabK2CancelL3Front parrySDownUpper parryWUpStep-backA + LRight + 3

Sorry that you can't play alone right now because I don't have enough time to program AI enemies. You can only play the PVP mode with a friend so far. I hope this won't kill your friendship :)

Inspired by Mordhau's battle mechanics
